src:
Kiwi姐姐見YOYO家族探班秒噴淚　演員超失控西瓜哥哥崩潰
04 Nov 2019, 14:03 by 蔡世偉
東森電視首部黃金九點檔大戲《美味滿閣》將於11/13(三)首播，該劇集結王傳一、魏蔓、龍劭華、苗可麗等人氣超夯的實力派演員，其中YOYO家族的Kiwi姐姐也初次參與戲劇演出。日前《YOYO點點名》節目更到劇組驚喜探班，事前完全不知情的Kiwi姐姐，一見到YOYO家族成員立刻感動大哭、眾人抱成一團。
而《美味滿閣》劇組也正如火如荼的趕拍中，為替初次演戲的Kiwi姐姐加油打氣，『YOYO點點名』節目日前更到劇組驚喜探班。西瓜哥哥、柳丁哥哥、月亮姐姐、番茄姐姐和好友朵朵都到場為她打氣。
事前完全不知情的Kiwi姐姐，一見到YOYO家族成員立刻感動大哭、眾人抱成一團，連月亮姊姊都說，看到她哭自己都跟著有點想哭。而番茄姐姐和朵朵則是一路藏到最後才拿著蛋糕現身，讓本以為探班要結束的她再次爆哭，直呼這次探班會讓她永生難忘。


Kiwi姐姐教《美味滿閣》林映彤(左)、王牧語(右)帶動唱。（東森提供）

Kiwi姐姐也跟哥哥姐姐們分享參演《美味滿閣》的幕後趣事，還現場模擬身為Kiwi姐姐與《美味滿閣》角色許薇琪的差異，並跟YOYO家族成員們介紹起圓滿閣餐廳的場景。也趁恢復姐姐身分，Kiwi姐姐現場還教劇中演員王牧語、林映彤一起做唱跳表演，3人從開始正經八百的學動作，到最後變成全場亂竄、還搞笑跳起千手觀音，讓西瓜哥哥不停笑喊她們很失控。
更新時間｜2019.11.04 14:01
text:
Kiwi sister sees the YOYO family to explore the class second tears actor super runaway watermelon brother collapse
04 Nov 2019, 14:03 by Cai Shiwei
Dongsen TV's first gold nine-point drama "Sweet Full Court" will be premiered on 11/13 (three). The drama is composed of Wang Chuanyi, Wei Man, Long Yuhua, Miao Keli and other popular actor, including YOYO. The family's Kiwi sister also participated in theatrical performance for the first time. A few days ago, the "YOYO Dot Name" program went to the crew to surprise the class. Kiwi sister, who was completely unaware of it beforehand, immediately touched the YOYO family members and immediately moved into a group.
The "Delicious Full Court" crew is also in full swing, in order to cheer for the Kiwi sister who played for the first time, the "YOYO Dot Name" program has recently come to the crew to surprise the class. Watermelon brother, Liu Ding brother, moon sister, tomato sister and friends blossomed to cheer her up.
Kiwi's sister, who was completely unaware of her before, immediately touched the YOYO family members and immediately moved to cry. The crowds all said that even the moon screamed and saw that she was crying and she wanted to cry. The tomato sister and the blossoming are all hiding in the end before holding the cake, letting her think that the expedition is over, she bursts to cry again, and the visit will make her unforgettable.


Sister Kiwi taught "Delicious House" Lin Yingxi (left) and Wang Muyu (right) to sing. (provided by Dongsen)

Sister Kiwi also shared with the older brothers and sisters the behind-the-scenes fun of the "Delicious Manchu", and also simulated the difference between the wife of Kiwi and the character of "The Delicious", and introduced the scene of the restaurant with YOYO family members. . Also, I resumed my sister’s identity. Kiwi’s sister also taught actors Wang Muyu and Lin Yingxi to perform singing and dancing together. The three people began to learn from the eight hundred, and finally became full of chaos, and also jumped a thousand hands Guanyin, let watermelon My brother kept laughing and laughing that they were out of control.
Update time|2019.11.04 14:01
